chapters.2: Testing throughout the software development lifecycle

tooltips.k_level:
ISTQB uses K-levels to measure depth of knowledge:
- K1 (Remember): Identify and recall terms and concepts.
- K2 (Understand): Understand and explain concepts or processes.
- K3 (Apply): Use knowledge to solve problems or perform tasks in real contexts.
tooltips.lo: LO codes (e.g. FL-4.2.1) correspond to specific sections of the Syllabus v4.0. You can use them to quickly find the subject in the official manual.
tooltips.scoring: The official CTFL v4.0 exam consists of 40 questions. To obtain certification, you need to score at least 65% (26 out of 40 questions).
tooltips.multiple_choice: Note: For these questions, you must select all correct options. No partial credit is given; either the answer is fully correct or it will be considered wrong.
